body_html:
@ibab @siddharth-agrawal I'm also going to throw my hat in the ring for this one- I took a pass at some of the refactoring that needed to be done in #3053.

I think using this thread to coordinate work is a good idea. I'll start off by saying I'm going to work on these guys:

  • CTCBeamSearchDecoder
  • CTCGreedyDecoder
  • CTCLoss

I think using this thread to coordinate work is a good idea. I'll start off by saying I'm going to work on these guys:
- CTCBeamSearchDecoder
